name: Mitigation Playbook for Script-Based Malicious Payloads
description: This playbook is designed to handle an incident involving the use of scripts to execute malicious payloads across a network. It outlines the steps for killing malicious processes, isolating hosts, and running security scans.

action--e5a0c2cc-47b3-4e2c-bb28-7c76c865.name: Kill malicious processes associated with script executions
action--e5a0c2cc-47b3-4e2c-bb28-7c76c865.description: Terminate any processes that are known to be executing the malicious script.

action--b3af77bb-6e61-4f5c-bc98-d784e1a6.name: Isolate affected hosts from the network
action--b3af77bb-6e61-4f5c-bc98-d784e1a6.description: Take affected hosts offline to stop the spread of the malware.

while-condition--f1041a57-e73f-41bc-bb44.name: Security scan loop
while-condition--f1041a57-e73f-41bc-bb44.description: Run security scan on affected hosts until they are clean.

action--e4167dae-1bfa-4f58-9eae-a59d3920.name: Run security scan on affected hosts
action--e4167dae-1bfa-4f58-9eae-a59d3920.description: Perform a scan and clean infections on all affected hosts.

parallel--6f078c35-2c0f-418b-87b4-d295ca.name: Parallel Execution for Mitigation Steps
parallel--6f078c35-2c0f-418b-87b4-d295ca.description: Execute isolation of hosts and security scans in parallel.
